page.title: 17THE DUCHY OF CORNWALL
page.content: THE MOST IMPORTANT FACTOR FOR THE LOCAL RESIDENTS OF THE AREA IN THE PAST, AND TO A LESSER EXTENT, THE PRESENT AND PERHAPS THE FUTURE IS THE {DUCHY OF CORNWALL.}THE DUCHY IS BY FAR THE{GREATEST LAND OWNER,}AND IS DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY RESPONSIBLE FOR THE LIVELIHOOD OF MANY OF THE LOCAL PEOPLE. THE{MAJORITY OF THE FARMS}ARE {DUCHY OWNED}AND WORKED BY TENNANT FARMERS. FOR MANY YEARS NOW,THE OLDER {CORNISH RESIDENTS}HAVE THOUGHT OF THEMSELVES AS BELONGING TO THE{DUCHY {VILLAGE AND}MANY OF THEM PAY THEIR RENT TO THE DUCHY. MANY OF THESE PEOPLE ARE PROUD POSSESSORS OF SOME MOMENTO OF A{ROYAL VISIT.}WITH THE {DUCHY HOME FARM}NOW BEING USED AS AN {AGRICULTURAL COLLEGE,}AND THE{SALE OF {DUCHY LAND AND PROPERTY}IT IS FELT BY MANY THAT THE{DUCHY CONNECTION}IS IS BEING{WEAKENED AND PERHAPS, LOST.
